commands.title: ExecLedger: Copy Latest Summary to Clipboard

ngksAutologger.enabled.description: Enable NGKs logging automatically on VS Code startup.

ngksAutologger.logRootMode.description: Where to store logs when outputRoot is blank. 'workspace' writes under .ngkssys/logs. 'global' writes under the user's AppData.

ngksAutologger.outputRoot.description: Absolute folder path for all logs. If set, logs are written under <outputRoot>\<workspaceName>\ngks-vscode-autologger\. Leave blank to use logRootMode (workspace/global).

ngksAutologger.autosaveToDownloads.description: Copy a artifacts artifact to Downloads on session end.

ngksAutologger.appName.description: Folder name used under Downloads\NGKsLogs\<appName> for artifacts copies.

ngksAutologger.renderer.includeHtml.description: Generate HTML audit report in addition to Markdown.

ngksAutologger.renderer.maxPayloadChars.description: Maximum characters to display in event payload rendering.

ngksAutologger.renderer.maxDiffLinesInRe.description: Maximum diff lines to include in audit report.

ngksAutologger.renderer.agentPreviewChar.description: Maximum characters to preview for agent input/output events.

execLedger.artifacts.outputRoot.description: Custom root directory for artifacts bundle exports. If empty, uses default _artifacts directory in workspace.

execLedger.artifacts.autoExportOnMilesto.description: Automatically export artifacts bundles when milestone phase gates complete successfully.

execLedger.artifacts.revealBundleAfterEx.description: Reveal the exported artifacts bundle location in file explorer after successful export.

enumDescriptions: PRO - Command Palette + Status Bar QuickPick menu
PREMIUM - Full desktop companion app access
execLedger.tier.description: ExecLedger tier level. Controls which UI features are available.

execLedger.outputRoot.description: Root folder containing ExecLedger artifacts outputs (exec_* folders).

execLedger.artifactsRoot.description: Override artifacts output root. If empty, uses <workspaceRoot>\_artifacts

execLedger.artifacts.copyReportToClipboa.description: Copy the full report text to clipboard when opening the latest artifacts report.

execLedger.artifacts.copySummaryToClipbo.description: Allow copying the artifacts summary to clipboard when using the Copy Latest Summary command.
